name: penny
description: A simple penny. its value is 1 farging.

name: nickel
description: A nickel. its value is 5 fargings.

name: dime
description: A dime. its value is 10 fargings.

name: quarter
description: A quarter. its value is 25 fargings.

name: the bible
description: The bible. some one once said its filled with wisdom and holy magic, maybe you can lern spells from it...you fell holy when holding it! its value is 100 fargings.

spells.name: crack the sky
spells.description: summon beams of light from the skies above!

spells.name: i <3 god
spells.description: increase your angel deal chance by 10%!

name: book of lucifer
description: The book of lucifer. its splashed with goat blood and, on its cover, a picture of a petagram, and upside down...you fell like you are making a sin when holding it... its value is 100 fargings.

spells.name: the rage of samson
spells.description: increases your DMG for a while!

spells.name: goat head
spells.description: increase your devil deal chance by 10%!

name: wisard's big spells book
description: Wisard's big spells book. a book from the man himself, enitas sonas, its is filled with spells from his knowledge, wild magic. and its value is 100 fargings.

name: red bean paste
description: Red bean paste, its juice is very sweet, filling you with a bit of health. its value is 25 fargings.

name: blue bean paste
description: Blue bean paste, its juice is very bright blue and with magic dust, filling you with a bit of body mana. its value is 25 fargings.

name: PB&J sandwich
description: A peaut butter and jelly sandwich, everyone likes it, because it make you like you go to the gym every day, but its does not last long. its value is 25 fargings.

name: candy
description: A candy, useless...? its worthless... its value is 0 fargings. also, eating it does not make you happy.
